mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tag (id, tag_name, use_count, reference_count, view_count, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{tagName}, #{usageCount}, #{referenceCount}, #{viewCount}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE tag SET use_count = use_count + 1, reference_count = reference_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tag SET use_count = use_count - 1, reference_count = reference_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND use_count > 0
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM tag t INNER JOIN article_tag_relation atr ON t.id = atr.tag_id WHERE atr.article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY atr.create_time ASC
SELECT * FROM tag WHERE tag_name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') AND status = 1 ORDER BY use_count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM tag WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY use_count DESC, view_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM tag WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY use_count DESC
